price: 62. Kaasi waa Allaah, Rabbigiin, Abuuraha wax walba, Ma jiro ilaah (Xaq ah) aan Isaga ahayn. ee xaggee baa la idiinka iilay?
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum khāliqu kulli shayin lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
